    • isDateBetween

      public static boolean isDateBetween(LocalDateTime check, LocalDateTime from, LocalDateTime to)
      Check if LocalDateTime check is between LocalDateTime from and LocalDateTime to.
      Parameters:
      check - the LocalDateTime to check.
      from - the LocalDateTime that defines the start of interval.
      to - the LocalDateTime that defines the end of interval.
      Returns:
      if check is between from and to.

    • calculateID

      public static String calculateID(String goal, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end, List<Choice> choices)
      Calculates the hashcode of a Election.
      Parameters:
      goal - the Election goal.
      start - the Election starting LocalDateTime.
      end - the Election ending LocalDateTime.
      choices - the Election choices.
      Returns:
      the hashcode without need to build it.
